allow: Bash(NODE_ENV=development DATABASE_URL="postgresql://neondb_owner:npg_csIURKah4TN5@ep-soft-salad-aeyhh2aj.c-2.us-east-2.aws.neon.tech/neondb?sslmode=require" psql $DATABASE_URL -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM underkategorier WHERE user_id = ''dev-user-123'';")

Bash(NODE_ENV=development DATABASE_URL="postgresql://neondb_owner:npg_csIURKah4TN5@ep-soft-salad-aeyhh2aj.c-2.us-east-2.aws.neon.tech/neondb?sslmode=require" psql $DATABASE_URL -c "SELECT id, name, huvudkategori_id FROM underkategorier WHERE user_id = ''dev-user-123'';")

Bash(NODE_ENV=development DATABASE_URL="postgresql://neondb_owner:npg_csIURKah4TN5@ep-soft-salad-aeyhh2aj.us-east-2.aws.neon.tech/neondb?sslmode=require" psql $DATABASE_URL -c "
INSERT INTO transactions (
  user_id, 
  account_id, 
  description, 
  amount, 
  date, 
  type,
  status
) VALUES (
  ''dev-user-123'',
  ''5303e234-112a-422b-91e3-07de66030b81'',
  ''Regular Transaction without Correction'',
  -3000,
  CURRENT_DATE,
  ''Transaction'',
  ''yellow''
) RETURNING id, description, amount;
")

Bash(NODE_ENV=development DATABASE_URL="postgresql://neondb_owner:npg_csIURKah4TN5@ep-soft-salad-aeyhh2aj.c-2.us-east-2.aws.neon.tech/neondb?sslmode=require" psql $DATABASE_URL -c "
-- Check how many transactions have invalid linkedTransactionId
SELECT COUNT(*) as invalid_count 
FROM transactions 
WHERE user_id = ''dev-user-123'' 
AND linked_transaction_id IS NOT NULL 
AND linked_transaction_id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM transactions WHERE user_id = ''dev-user-123'');
")
